snippet: A survey of investment professionals whose forecasts proved accurate in 2014 indicates a roller-coaster ride for stocks, bonds and oil prices.
abstract: James B Stewart Common Sense column reveals results of annual survey of successful investors that predicts significant financial volatility in year ahead and notes there are early indications to support their assertions; examines select responses from informal poll, including predictions on price of bonds and oil.
lead_paragraph: A survey of investment professionals whose forecasts proved accurate in 2014 indicates a roller-coaster ride for stocks, bonds and oil prices.

headline.print_headline: Those Who Nailed ’14 See Volatility This Year
headline.main: Those Who Nailed 2014 See Volatility This Year
